title: Codename: Bear: Secret Agent
description: Razdorans want to claim Earth as their property, and under interstellar law, they can, if our governments fall into anarchy. They use a man named Centurian to fuel drug trades, assassinations, and human trafficking all across Earth. If they can claim us as a territory, youths will be shipped to factory planets, and mineral resources will be strip mined layer by layer.Chor'Tan are friendly to mankind. They are close to us genetically. Their race is limited by the males of the species. A male Chor'Tan is no more intelligent than an Earth crocodile or alligator, and they want to cross breed with humanity to create a species with smart males. An anti-crime agency is set up to fight Centurian's forces, and they recruit a young man they Codename: Bear. He works with a team of other agents, going on missions trying to put an end to Centurian's reign of terror.
author: Geoffrey C. Porter
